name: Horse World Online - A horse breeding game
blurb: Breed horses, compete against friends and expand your virtual stable in this browser-based game with hundreds of dynamic horse breeds!

rewards.reward: As a thank you every backer will receive a Premium Account upgrade for 6 months. Even if all you pledge is a single dollar! Also, we'll match your pledge amount for equal value of Pony Tokens which can be used to purchase special in-game items!
BACKERS BADGE - \r\n\r\nYou'll get our everlasting gratitude and a Backers Badge accomplishment to show you've helped fund this game!
EARLY ACCESS - \r\n\r\nGet access to the game 7 days earlier than the general public. You'll also be awarded the Backers Badge accomplishment to show you've helped fund this game.

ONE EXCLUSIVE TACK SET - \r\n\r\nEarly Access reward plus receive a Kickstarter exclusive tack set. Choose from English, Western or Racing. Each set includes a saddle, bridle, saddle pad and quarter mark.

TWO EXCLUSIVE TACK SETS - \r\n\r\nEarly Access reward plus receive TWO Kickstarter exclusive tack sets. Choose from English, Western or Racing. Each set includes a saddle, bridle, saddle pad and quarter mark.
ALL THE SETS - \r\n\r\nEarly Access reward plus all of the items in the Western Set, English Set and Racing Set. You'll be ready for any competition!

EXCLUSIVE QUARTER MARKS & DECORATIONS - \r\n"All The Sets" reward above plus receive a Kickstarter exclusive set of quarter marks, ribbons, and other decorations for your horse to wear. Set will include at least 15 assorted items to be determined.

BETA TESTER - \r\nAll the rewards from the "Quarter Marks & Decorations" tier plus you'll get access to the game during the Beta Phase, which will be at least two months earlier than everyone else, and a special Beta Tester Badge!

ITEM SPONSOR - \r\nAll the rewards from the "Beta Tester" tier plus we'll create an in-game food, decoration or horse apparel item to your specifications. You'll be credited in the item description and receive 3 copies of your item! Restrictions apply; please read details to the left.

CUSTOM HORSES - \r\nAll the rewards from the "Beta Tester" tier plus receive 3 custom horses created from the genes you choose in our custom horse creator. Restrictions apply; please read details to the left.

FOAL ADOPTION CUSTOMIZER - \r\nAll the rewards from the "Custom Horses" tier plus access to our foal customizer in the adoption center, so you can customise the appearance of any foal you adopt! Restrictions apply; please read details to the left.

CUSTOM WHITE PATTERN - \r\nAll the rewards from the "Foal Adoption Customizer" tier plus we'll create a horse with the genes necessary to generate a white pattern designed to your specifications and give you a foal of any breed with those genes and pattern! Restrictions apply; please read details to the left.

CUSTOM BREED - \r\nAll the rewards from the "Custom White Pattern" tier plusand we'll create a new breed to your specifications and give you credit in the breed description. You'll also control the breed registry and we'll give you 5 horses of your breed! Wow! Restrictions apply; please read the details to the left.

GET ME ON IT! - \r\nAll the rewards from the "Foal Adoption Customizer" tier plus you'll get instant access to the Alpha version of the game. Right. Now. Your opinions will help shape the future of the game! Restrictions apply; please read the details to the left.
